subject: Warranty Claim â€“ BreezeLite Everyday Dryer Cool Shot Button
body:
Hi,

The cool-shot button on my BreezeLite Everyday Dryer (Model BLD-150) stopped functioning after a few weeks. All other features work fine. Please confirm if this can be repaired under warranty.

Thanks,
Emily Wilson
Phone: +1-555-004-4004
Email: emily.wilson@gmail.com
